awd_titl_txt: Colorado State University Young Scholars Program
awd_abstract_narration: The Colorado State University will initiate a four-week,                        residential Young Scholars project in the Plant and Soil Sciences               for 25 students entering grade 12.                                                                                                                              University faculty members and cooperating federal scientists                   will deliver lectures, lead discussions, conduct field trips and                provide students with research experiences.                                                                                                                     Follow-up activities include the use of a newsletter to exchange                information among the student participants and to communicate                   with their science teachers.  Students will share the results of                their research projects by presenting poster papers.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)
